document_data.name: Dhedluk
document_data.mainbody: '''Dhedluk''' was a farmer living in [[Cormyr]] who, in [[432 DR]], helped King [[Duar Obarskyr]] and his party raid the [[Dheolur]] manor house. He had messy grey hair and wore a cap.
